choices: Remain unnoticed until after the meeting
1.content:
As a kid trying to make it in the wrestling business you have to look out for number one & not get pushed around. Sometimes you have to get pushed around if you know whats good for you. With that said, i had been working in the WWE Development program for nearly two years & had finally gotten a call up to the main roster. I'm losing to a mid carder but i don't care, I'm on the ladder so I'm happy.

Anyway, the day of my debut came & i was as nervous as hell, i didn't realise it was going to be on the Live show! I got to the arena a few hours early so i could ramble around backstage by myself to try & calm down. It wasnt working so i got a coffee & kept walking. I was heading down a narrow hallway when Stephanie McMahon, the boss's daughter, came charging around the corner & ran straight into me. Luckily i had a lid on the coffee cup because otherwise hot coffee was all over both of us. Stephanie was already pissed with something & running into someone she has never even seen before did not help her mood.

"WATCH WHERE YOU ARE GOING YOU IDIOT!!" Stephanie screamed at me. I tried to apologize but she cut me off.

"Who are you? Why are you in my arena?" She demanded to know. Caught off guard i struggled but finally got some words out.

"I.. I'm a rookie. I'm against..."

"I DON'T CARE ANYMORE!!!" Stephanie screamed again.

She pushed past me & continued down the hallway. I mumbled "Bitch" under my breath but she heard me. Stephanie turned back to me irate.

"My office, Ten Minutes." She stated before walking off again.

I put my head in my hands. First day & I piss off the boss's daughter. I'm going to have a really long career at this rate. I'll be surprised if she wants me in her office for anything other than to fire me. She could fire me & no-one would even notice. Hopefully she will see sense & not fire me over something so small & stupid.

The ten minutes felt like ten seconds as i walked towards Stephanie's office. I hesitated before knocking. I knocked & was told to enter. I went in slowly & seen Stephanie sitting behind her desk at her computer. She gave me a quick look before turning back to her computer. I stood there motionless while she continued about her business after several minutes she finally sat back & looked at me. After a few minutes of me trying to avoid any eye contact she spoke up.

"Who exactly do you think you are?" She asked to which i decided best not to answer.

"Do you not know who i am? I'm Stephanie McMahon, i can crush you like a little bug if i wanted to." She continued in a superior tone of voice.

"You have the cheek to disrespect me? On your first day? Do you not want this chance or are you just stupid?" She asked to which again i didn't answer.

"Well?" She asked again.

"I'm sorry." Is my feeble response.

"Oh i know that. But, i can't let you off that easy now can i? Hmmmm, what to do?" Stephanie says almost mocking me.

"How badly do you want this job?" Stephanie asked.

"More than anything in the world. Please don't fire me, I'll do anything." I beg.

"You'll do anything i tell you to do, even if you weren't in trouble. But don't worry, I'm not going to fire you. I have been reading up on you & it seems you may have potential." Stephanie says with a change in her tone.

"I'm not firing you, because another company will sign you up. I'm not sending you back to development because it would be a waste. So I'll tell you what."

"For years i have been trying to get my husband to take part, but he refuses every time. If you want to get in my good books & potentially get a push, you'll do what i ask you to do now. Agree?"

"Ummm, sure?" I reply unsure of what is coming next.

"Good. I have always wanted my own slave. I could do it on TV but, i couldn't do everything i want so it would be pointless. Since I'm happily married that's another avenue closed. But now i can use you." Stephanie says arrogantly.

I'm thinking to myself, this is a company that has lesbians making out in the ring & had a 90 year old give birth to a hand, what the hell could she not have done on TV?

Stephanie slides her chair around to the side of her table & tells me to come around to her. I snap out of my own thoughts & do so. Stephanie tells to me get on my knees & i do without hesitation. Stephanie then puts both of her feet on my lap & tells me to take off her shoes. I look up at her but see she is serious.

I open the strap on her Chante T-Strap Pump (See attachment) & slip it off. She then tells me to lick the insole for her. I look at the insole & can see the sweat glistening off the soft surface. I stick out my tongue & run it the length of her insole. After only one lick Stephanie takes the pump off me & holds it. She tells me to lick the sole of it clean since she has been walking around in it all day.

The sole is really worn down & filthy. I figure if she was joking she would not have had me lick her insole covered in sweat. I start to lick the sole but to be honest, it does nothing. Despite it doing nothing Stephanie remains seated & looking down at me licking the sole of her pump in her hand.

After about twenty minutes she drops her pump & quickly raises her bare foot. I glance up at Stephanie's face & see she has a devilish smile on it. As I'm looking at her face she drives her bare foot into my face. My nose goes between her big toe & middle toe so she squeezes. I open my mouth to breath but she shoves the rest of her foot in to cover my mouth. I try to move back but before long i hit a wall. Stephanie's chair has wheel's so she simply slides along with me. When i get to the wall she pushes back really hard whilst laughing at my helplessness.

A minute or two pass before she releases my nose & i can breath again. The stench i get makes me wish she had kept squeezing.

"Tongue out." Stephanie demands as i struggle to breath.

I stick my tongue out & she places her heel on my tongue but then there is a knock at her door. She quickly slides her chair back over to her desk while telling me to get under the table. I crawl under as she pulls her chair in tight leaving me only a couple of inches from her legs. She quickly tells me to repeat with her other foot before telling whoever was at the door to come in.

I try to maneuver myself so i can open the straps without making any noise. I can hear three women talking, one is obviously Stephanie but the other two take a few minutes to figure out. As i get Stephanie's second pump off i figure out who the other two women are. One is Melina Perez who is wrestling tonight & will want a run down of her match. The other woman is Maria Kanellis, an interviewer who will want a run down of the whole show! I could be here for hours!
1.title: And so it begins

121.content:
Mickie James runs into the ring ready for her match, but not knowing who she is going to face. Melina appears on stage.

"Mickie, I met a new wrestler backstage who claims he can beat any woman in the WWE," Melina tells Mickie. The fans boo. "He claims the only place a woman belongs is barefoot in the kitchen." More boos.

Mickie James looks angry, "Who is he? Introduce him to me so I can kick his ass."

Suddenly my music plays as I walk on stage. I am very sore and tired from Melina squeezing my balls. I also never said any of those things about woman, and I plan on clearing it up with Mickie and the fans. Regardless, the fans boo me as I walk on stage.

I look Mickie in the eye, as she spits on me. I let it slide, "I want to clarify, I never said a woman's place is barefoot in the kitchen."

Melina contradicts me, "He is lying. He also said he can easily beat you in a wrestling match."

Mickie looks at me in disbelief, "Do you think you can beat me in a wrestling match?"

"You're a woman, of course," I blurt out. I realize the mistake I made,

"Fine," Mickie responds, "You and me one on one right now."

Mickie suddenly drop kicks me. I fall into the ropes as Mickie starts choking me with her foot. The referee separates her from me as I turn to my stomach. Suddenly, Melina gouges my eyes from outside, while the referee is looking away.

"You're going to be Mickie's bitch," Melina tells me.

Mickie grabs my hair and moves me to the center of the ring. She jumps, wraps her legs around my neck, and performs a hurricanrana. The fans cheer. She picks me up and does a spinning heel kick. As I fall to the ground, she climbs the ropes and does a body splash on me.

"One... two... th..." the referee counts as I kick out last minute.

Mickie gets mad and throws me out of the ring, then starts arguing with the referee.

"Hi loser," Melina tells me as she punches me in the head.

While the referee is arguing with Mickie, Melina wraps her legs around me and chokes me. I try separating her legs, but they are to strong for me. The referee finally sees this and tells Melina to stop. Melina insincerely apologizes and I crawl back into the ring.

"You want some more?" Mickie kicks me in the face.

Mickie starts stomping, then picks me up again. I have a burst of energy and clothesline her as hard as possible. Unfortunately, my clothesline also connects with the referee. With the referee out, Melina arrogantly walks into the ring.

"I am going to make you my bitch," Melina tells me.

Melina puts her boots on my testicles as I scream in pain. She starts squeezing and twisting my testicles. I beg for mercy, but she just laughs. Mickie James gets up and tells Melina to pick me up. Melina gets me on my feet, then suddenly I am sandwiched between two kicks from Melina and Mickie. My brain rattles in my head. I fall to the ground barely conscious.

"What's going on?" a now conscious referee asks Melina.

The referee tells Melina to go backstage. Melina obliges, knowing I am done for. Mickie slowly grabs me and goes to the top turnbuckle, then hits a tornado DDT on me. She sits on my chest as the referee counts to three.

Mickie starts slapping me in the face and trash talking to me, "Wow, you were so tough. Do you want to fight again? I bet I could make you tap out." Suddenly Mickie's face lightens up. "I have an idea."

I gulp.
121.title: Mickie James

1212.content:
Mickie smirks at me as she sits on top of my chest. Leaning in next to my head, she whispers into my ear.

"Tell you what, wimp... I think that I could probably train you to be at least marginally less pathetic. I'll be your manager and whip you into shape! If you follow my lead, I bet you could have some hidden potential. So what do you think? If you turn this offer down, you'll just be a miserable little pansy for the rest of your life!"

I gulp again. I don't know if Mickie is trying to be nice to me now, or if she just plans on torturing me more... Either way, I wasn't in much of a position to say anything that might tick her off. Reluctantly, I mumbled to her that I would accept her offer. Mickie simply laughs at me again.

"Good boy! It looks like you aren't as stupid as I thought you were! Maybe once we get you into decent shape, I might even be willing to be your girlfriend..."

She then gives me a teasing kiss on the cheek and gets off of my chest. At this point, I didn't know what to think. It seemed obvious that Mickie was planning something, but rather it was something I would enjoy or not was another story.

The next day, Mickie greets me for the start of our training together. As the training goes on...
1212.title: Mickie's change of heart?!

I spent the next few hours licking the soles, in between the toes & even sucking the toes of Stephanie McMahon while she chatted with Melina & Maria. "What was that?" Asks Melina.

"From under Stephanie's desk." Continues Maria.

"Why was he under your desk?" Asks Melina before Maria is even finished.

"This ladies, is an idiot" Stephanie coldly responds.

"He tried to pour a cup of coffee over me earlier today & he is now paying for it." Stephanie continues.

"Wow, he is an idiot. But how is he paying for it by being under your desk?" Maria says.

"He was licking my feet because he is my little bitch now." Stephanie responds.

"Does he like it?" Melina asks.

"I don't care. I like it. That's all that matters. Hmmm, your shoes would be quite dirty now wouldn't they?" Asks Stephanie.

"Emmm, yeah, probably. I always wear these from show to show. Why?" Responds Melina.

"Yeah, my trainers are old but comfortable." Is Maria's reply.

"Sit down ladies. Idiot, clean their shoes." Stephanie commands.

Maria & Melina both sit back down as i crawl around to them. I come to Maria first. I look up at her big green eyes & see she is enjoying this. I was hoping she would have some sympathy because i know Melina has a reputation for being a bitch. I lift up Maria's left foot & run my tongue the length of her sole.

"This is sooo cool!" Maria shouts.

"It's amazing watching him go up the length of my foot & the look in his eyes, awwww, it makes, it makes me feel... powerful." Maria says unable to restrain her excitement.

"Do it again!" Maria exclaims.

As i pick move in to do so Stephanie McMahon's cell phone rings.

"Dammit! Keep going, I'll be back in a minute." Stephanie says before stepping out of her office.

"Did you really throw coffee at her?" Melina asks me.

"No, i bumped into her. No coffee left the cup." I reply.

"That doesn't seem fair, tell you what, I'll try talk Steph out of this when she comes back OK?" Melina says completely going against what i had heard about her.

"Emmm, sure?" I reply, not believing my ears.

"Hey! I like this!" Maria whines.

"So?" Melina replies unmoved.

With that Stephanie McMahon walks back into the room. I quickly grab Maria's foot again & the smile returns to her face.

"Steph, we need to talk." Melina says.

"Sure, whats on your mind?" Stephanie asks in response.

"When you left the room, your "Bitch" as you put it, refused to continue. He said he doesn't have to listen to us. I nicely told him it would annoy you but he said, well I'm not going to repeat what he called you." Melina says to my disbelief.

My first impression was right, she is a manipulative bitch! Their is no point in arguing because Stephanie wont believe me anyway.

"It's true." Maria adds.

"Well then." Stephanie says walking over to me.

"I have an idea Steph. His match is unannounced right? How about you make him lose to me in a matter of seconds. Punish him for what he said about you." Melina suggests.

"Sure. Make sure you look good though." Stephanie responds.

"Great, i gotta go get changed then. See you out there, bitch!" Melina says before standing up & leaving.

"Maria, i have to go to a meeting now but can you do me a favor & keep him busy?" Stephanie asks.

"Of course!" Maria replies full of enthusiasm.

"Great, use one of the private locker room's so you wont be disturbed." Stephanie states as she collects her belongings from her desk.

I look up at Maria & see a devilish smile on her face as she stands up & motions for me to follow.

"Ok, start at the heel and work slowly up my sole and then in between each toe." Maria confidently orders me.

I was hoping she would have reconsidered Melina's idea but it seems not. I get up off my knees and start to leave when Stephanie speaks again.

"To get changed like you said." I feebly reply.

"I never told you to leave the room. You are going to get changed in front of us. You belong to me now, remember?" Stephanie says with some attitude in her voice but I already know better than to talk back or question her.

I stand in front of both Stephanie McMahon and Maria and begin to strip down naked. Once naked Stephanie starts to shake her head as Maria speaks.

"I always thought wrestlers were quite big down there?" Maria asks.

"Clearly not the case with this one." Replies Stephanie with a mocking tone in her voice.

"Am i interrupting?" Melina is back.

"Not at all, come, have a seat." Stephanie invites Melina to join my humiliation.

"He's not up to much is he?" Melina Questions.

"I almost feel bad for him." Says Maria who for some reason i doubt is serious.

"Look my pinkie finger is bigger than it!" Melina bursts out laughing as she wiggles her little finger at me.

"Why are you just standing there? Get dressed you moron!" Stephanie orders with a firm tone.

I pull some wrestling gear out of the bag in which Stephanie threw at me a couple of minutes ago and continue to get dressed in front of the three divas. "I'll decide on a punishment should either of you get hurt out there. Even so much as a broken nail will result in a severe punishment for you." Stephanie McMahon smugly talks down to me.

Stephanie McMahon has already raped me of my pride, dignity and self respect, and i have only known her a couple of hours! I better be careful in the match not to hurt Melina in any way.

As I follow her back towards her office Stephanie doesn’t say a word the entire time. We finally get to her office where Melina and Maria are already waiting. Once inside, Melina shoves me up against the wall and gets in my face.

“Emm…. Three?” I reply.

“Mine too.” Says Stephanie.

“Well, what were they?” Asks Melina.

“Well, one was to kiss Stephanie’s feet in the middle of the ring live on Raw. Two was to kiss your’s and mine feet in the middle of the ring on Raw. Three was to …” Maria explains before Stephanie cuts her off.

At this point I think Three must have been to kiss all of them in the ring. Well, my humiliation is now going to be complete.

“Number three was to teach you a very painful lesson. You need to realise that I own you. That means you do what I say, when I say and how I say. I told you to obey Melina, but you didn’t so now, I have to teach you a lesson.” Stephanie says before picking up her phone.

After an eternity under the diva's feet,She is closing the meeting. She removes her feet from your face and tries to locate her pumps. I grab her pumps and gently put them on for her, which made Stephanie smirk above the desk. She walks over and says her goodbyes, and the women leave.

I hear her walk over and pull out her chair. "Out."

I crawl out and stay on my hand and knees in front of her. I feel too embarrassed to look straight at the woman who humiliated me so completely.

"You know, I think you'll make a great slave." She leans down and ruffles my hair like a puppy.

She laughed "You know, I bet you won't appreciate how funny this is, but I was actually joking about being my slave forever."

I did not understand at all.

She hopped up on her desk and crossed her legs. I looked up until I was almost looking her in the eye.
"Yeah, I was just going to make you be my bitch for today, so that you would learn to respect me later, but since you were so damn good at it, I figured it would be a shame not to keep you doing what you're good at, being a bitch." She clasped her hands together, and laughed wickedly.

I was overwhelmed. If I hadn't been so enthusiastic under her desk, she would have LET ME GO! Now not only am I hers as long as she wants, I have to be THAT pathetic with her all the time, because that's what she expects from me.

"But don't worry slave boy, I will reward good service. How about a free meal."

I guessed it was better than nothing. "Ok, thank you.

Stephanie jumped off the desk and kicked me in the face "YOU CALL ME MA'AM, YOU LITTLE SHIT, GOT IT?!?!?!?!"
"Yes Ma'am, I groaned, holding my nose. "Good"
She grabbed me by the neck and forced me towards the ground. "Eat that"

I looked in front of me, and there was a piece of gum on the floor. It was one of those pieces that had been there and had been stepped on so long, it had turned gray, and looked like part of the floor.

Without hesitation, I scraped the gum off the floor. It took a minute to get it all. I can't describe how revolting it tasted, I wouldn't try to imagine it if I was you. I made sure to thank Ms. McMahon for my meal.

She laughs "Your welcome, don't expect me to be this nice EVERY day. Now carry my shit to the car, I want to go home."
I grab her bag of extra clothes, her briefcase, her gym gear, a pile of papers, and her pocket book, and walk behind her struggling, while she strutted empty handed ahead of me, looking every bit the bitchy diva she is. I hear some people sniggering around me and turn red, It's what I'm going to have to get used to.

It turns out that my car is right next to hers. My old crappy hunk of metal looked even worse parked next to her brand new Porsche Carrera. "That's fitting" She said. She pulled out her keys and walked towards the end of the car. I opened the back door and put in her things. Then I opened the drivers side door for her.

She walked towards me, scraping her key against the side of my car as she walked. She put her hand on my shoulder and forced me too my knees. "I'll see you tomorrow, wimp." She turned around and waited, her toned behind in my face. I quickly puckered up and kissed her ass.

She got in her car and turned it on. While I was still kneeling, she revved up the car and drove away fast, splashing me and my car with mud.

1433.content:
“I can tell you’re the new guy.” A voice comes from behind me and startles me. I quickly turn while still on my knees and see Linda McMahon standing in front of me with her arms crossed and a smile on her face looking down on me.

“Yeah, first day.” I reply before getting back to my feet.

“Good news is, she likes you. She let you kiss her ass, that only happens if she likes you.” Linda explains.

“It’s happened before?” I ask.

“With every new guy that comes through here, it’s pretty much her way of testing you. Keep up the good work, it looks like you will pass.” Linda says before she uncrosses her arms and puts her hands on her hips.

“Thanks for the heads up.” I reply.

“You’re welcome.” Linda responds as I turn and start to walk towards my car to leave.

“And where do you think you are going?” Linda questions.

“To my hotel.” I reply confused as to the origin of the question.

“No, you’re not. Get back over here, I didn’t say you could leave yet. In case you forgot, it’s not only Stephanie that owns you, I also own you.” Linda says in a much firmer tone than before.

“I’m sorry, what?” I cant believe what I am hearing.

“On your knees bitch and kiss my feet!” Linda demands and I decide not to question her. If she is anything like Stephanie, that would be a very bad idea. I drop to my knees in front of Linda, lower my head and kiss each foot on the toe section. I look back up at Linda and am relived to see that she appears happy enough. Without saying another word, Linda brushes past me and heads over to her limo which soon speeds away. Like Mother, Like Daughter I think to myself.
1433.title: Linda McMahon approaches you.

14332.content:
Still on my knees in the near empty car park and I begin to wonder how exactly I ended up like this. This time yesterday I was on top of the world getting ready for my first day, now, Stephanie with a little help from her mother, has made me feel like crap. I was just about to get back up to my feet when Stephanie's car speeds back in and stops only inches before hitting me. The window rolls down and Stephanie looks at me with a big smirk on her face.

"You know what?" Stephanie asks but I don’t dare answer.

"I think you deserve a little reward for being such a good slave today. I checked out your hotel and it's a dump. You're coming with me. Get in, now!" Stephanie demands and I'm not going to risk annoying her in this situation so I quickly rise to my feet and get in the passengers side of the car. I fasten my seatbelt and Stephanie floors the gas to send the car speeding back out of the car park. Apparently she has never heard of speed limits, or if she has, they likely don’t apply to her.

I sit in the front seat, only inches away from the woman who humiliated and broke me in a matter of hours and wonder why she is suddenly being so nice to me. We drive for about fifteen minutes with neither of us saying a word until we pull up outside a very expensive looking hotel. Stephanie gets out and throws the keys at a valet without even looking at him. I quickly follow Stephanie as she marches into the hotel like she owns it. Stephanie ignores all the hotel staff who greet her as she keeps walking towards the elevator. We go up to the 19th floor in silence before stepping out and walking down a long hallway. Eventually, Stephanie pulls a hotel key from her handbag and opens a door. Stephanie goes inside and motions for me to do the same. Once inside I take a good look around and realise Stephanie was right. My hotel is a dump compared to this. A giant queen sized bed takes up the centre of the room and I'd bet it could comfortably hold up to five people, a long large sofa runs the length of one wall while a huge plasma television is mounted above it. Over in the far corner is another door that I assume is the bathroom.

"Since you were so eager to serve me today, I decided that I should treat you a little better than I originally planned. From now on, everywhere I go, you go. You'll be staying in the sae room as me in every hotel we stay in and you'll be riding in the same car as me as well. From time to time we will fly and in those events you will be on the plane as me. Quite simply, I never want to out of my sight just in case I need anything. Are you okay with these terms or would you rather I treat you like dirt and send you to your own hotel?"
